EmailTemplate.description: Instructions to Prepare Your Browser for using Salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.name: Roll-out: Prepare Your Browser
EmailTemplate.subject: Please prepare your web browser to use Salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
In anticipation of the launch of Salesforce.com, please take a few moments to prepare and optimize your web browser. A job aid has been developed to help you with this request.
The preparation of your browser should take approximately 15 minutes of active engagement. If your computer does not have the latest required software updates, this job aid will instruct you install those, before upgrading and/or configuring your browser - these may take time to run, so consider installing required updates as the final task in your work day or work week.
You can download the job aid by clicking on the link below, or pasting it into your browser window: https://na1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000lp1bh3mTGhdyBksBrwhFg0XLgOh8inQ=
I look forward to speaking to you at our Kick-off call on Tuesday!
Kind Regards, {!User.FirstName}
{!User.Title} {!User.CompanyName}
Sears Commercial has partnered with Salesforce.com to bring the world’s leading sales enablement technology to its Account Managers. Soon our Account Managers will begin seeing the positive impact in sales revenues which have been achieved by Salesforce.com customers across its base of over 77,500 companies and over 2,000,000 sales users.
